actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize a reduction in U.S. troop levels overseas.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the contingent of United States troops and military and civilian support elements stationed overseas be reduced by two-thirds, such reduction to be accomplished in stages over the next two years, with those troops brought home to be demobilized within one year of returning to the United States.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize a reduction in U.S. troop levels overseas.
